```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{css echo=FALSE}
body {
  font-family: "Inconsolata Black", monospace; }

*::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 10px; }

*::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background: #BF9B8E; }

*::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background-color: #8C6E68;
  border-radius: 20px;
  border: 3px solid #8C6E68; }

a {
  color: #8C6E68 }
  a:hover, a:focus {
    color: #BF9B8E; }

code {
  font-weight: 550;
  color: #8C6E68; }

h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  color: #8C6E68; }

.cover-card {
  text-align: center; }
  
.cover-card .author_name {
  color: #8C6E68;
  font-size: 3em;
  line-height: 100% }
    
.cover-card .author_job {
  color: #D9C1BF;
  font-size: 1em;
  font-weight: 500;
  text-transform: uppercase; }
    
.cover-card .author_bio {
  font-size: 0.75em;
  font-style: italic}

.post-listing {
  width: 80%; }

#post {
  font-size: 0.85em; }
  
#post h2 {
  padding-bottom: 0em;
  border-bottom: thick double #D9C1BF; }
```
